code: import React from'react';import useFetch from'../hooks/useFetch';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Showcase=()=>{const{data,loading,error}=useFetch('https://api.example.com/items');if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error fetching data: ",error.message]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"showcase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Showcase Items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:data.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description})]},item.id))})]});};export default Showcase;
